import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Button, Col } from "reactstrap"; class Contact extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { firstname: "", lastname: "", telnum: "", email: "", aggree: false, contactType: "tel.", message: "" } this.handleInputChange = this.handleInputChange.bind(this) } handleInputChange = event => { const value = event.target === 'checkbox' ? event.target.checked : event.target.value; const name = event.target.name this.setState({ [name]: value }) } handleSubmit = () => { } render(){ return (

Send us your feedback

) } } export default Contact;
